Module com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.internal
Package com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.internal.net.ssl

Class DtlsDatagramSocket

java.lang.Object
java.net.DatagramSocket
com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.internal.net.FilterDatagramSocket
com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.internal.net.ssl.DtlsDatagramSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public final class DtlsDatagramSocket extends FilterDatagramSocket
A DatagramSocket layered with Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS).

    • getChannel

      public DatagramChannel getChannel()
      Throws an UnsupportedOperationException.
      Overrides:
      getChannel in class FilterDatagramSocket
      Returns:

    • getEnabledCipherSuites

      public String[] getEnabledCipherSuites()
      Returns a String array of acceptable cipher suites enabled for DTLS connections.
      Returns:
      a String array of acceptable cipher suites enabled for DTLS connections

    • setEnabledCipherSuites

      public void setEnabledCipherSuites(String[] suites)
      Sets the String array of acceptable cipher suites enabled for DTLS connections with a provided String array. An IllegalStateException is thrown if this DtlsDatagramSocket is in use (sending and/or receiving packets).
      Parameters:
      suites - the provided String array of acceptable cipher suites enabled for DTLS connections

    • getEnabledProtocols

      public String[] getEnabledProtocols()
      Returns a String array of acceptable protocol versions enabled for DTLS connections.
      Returns:
      a String array of acceptable protocol versions enabled for DTLS connections

    • setEnabledProtocols

      public void setEnabledProtocols(String[] protocols)
      Sets the String array of acceptable protocol versions enabled for DTLS connections with the provided String array. An IllegalStateException is thrown if this DtlsDatagramSocket is in use (sending and/or receiving packets).
      Parameters:
      protocols - the provided String array of acceptable protocol versions enabled for DTLS connections

    • getMaximumPacketSize

      public int getMaximumPacketSize()
      Returns the maximum size of a datagram packet.
      Returns:
      the maximum size of a datagram packet

    • setMaximumPacketSize

      public void setMaximumPacketSize(int maxPacketSize)
      Sets the maximum size of a datagram packet with the provided maximum size. An IllegalStateException is thrown if this DtlsDatagramSocket is in use (sending and/or receiving packets). An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the provided maximum size is less than zero.
      Parameters:
      maxPacketSize - the provided maximum size

    • getUseClientMode

      public boolean getUseClientMode()
      Returns the boolean value to indicate that this DtlsDatagramSocket will operate in client mode, meaning it will initiate the communication with the peer.
      Returns:
      the boolean value to indicate that this DtlsDatagramSocket will operate in client mode

    • setUseClientMode

      public void setUseClientMode(boolean mode)
      Sets the boolean value to indicate that this DtlsDatagramSocket will operate in client mode with the provided boolean value. An IllegalStateException is thrown if this DtlsDatagramSocket is in use (sending and/or receiving packets).
      Parameters:
      mode - the provided boolean value to indicate that this DtlsDatagramSocket will operate in client mode with the provided boolean value
